elements.label: A Day for New Acquaintances
elements.description: I might find a kindred spirit.

elements.label: A Day for New Patrons
elements.description: I might find someone who could offer assistance.

elements.label: A Day for Unsavoury Connections
elements.description: I might find someone prepared to get their hands dirty.

elements.label: A Day for Cartographers
elements.description: I might stumble across somewhere interesting.

elements.label: A Season of Sickness
elements.description: Malign influences taint the night air. [My Health may soon suffer. Wounded Followers may die.]

elements.label: A Season of Serenities
elements.description: Tomorrow may be a better day.

elements.label: A Season of Ambitions
elements.description: This is the season that the winds of the Wood reverse direction: a time when appetites and mortals both rise.

elements.label: A Season of Silence
elements.description: These are the days of anticipation.

elements.label: A Season of Ardours
elements.description: We are all of us both ape and angel.

elements.label: A Murderous Scheme
elements.description: Traces left by a rival's decision to move against an enemy.

elements.label: A Bold Scheme
elements.description: Traces left by a rival's decision to move boldly.

elements.label: A Cautious Scheme
elements.description: Traces left by a rival's decision to move cautiously.
